Html:
Hello Radiomen,

i want to show an additional label. I can do this with a custommarker, but the Marker must be in range.

The label should looks like the rendertime in the DemoProject. I can change in GMapControl but i just use your dll.

Is it possible to make an own label, shown permanently?

Thanks

Bye RobbeEDE

thanks for your question about. I got it for myself to do it with an own CustomControl.

My wish was to give some additional information as g.drawstring on the map. Sth like zoominformation and markercounter.

Thank you very much^^
